title: Scheduled Cash Shop Maintenance - October 5, 2023
content: We will be performing a scheduled Cash Shop maintenance on Thursday, October 5, 2023 at 5:00 AM PDT (8:00 AM EDT / 2:00 PM CEST / 11:00 PM AEDT).

title: [Completed] Scheduled Game Update - October 4, 2023
content: The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 6 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.

title: Cash Shop Update for October 4
content: Luna Crystal, Gachapon Update, Wisp's Wondrous Wonderberry, Royal Styles, and more!

title: [Updated 10/4] v.245 - Midnight Carnival - Nautilus Patch Notes
content: Click here to read the patch notes for v.245 - Midnight Carnival - Nautilus.

title: v.245 - Midnight Carnival - Nautilus Update Preview
content: Night Troupe, the festival of dreams and illusions, is back!
